entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/master/api_webgisclient/api-gateway/deploymentconfig.yaml -p NAMESPACE=gdi-production -p TAG=2.0.25 -p REPLICAS=2 -p CPU_REQUEST=100m -p CPU_LIMIT=1000m -p MEMORY_REQUEST=128Mi -p MEMORY_LIMIT=256Mi -p ENVIRONMENT=-prod -p LOADBALANCE=true -p SSL=true | oc apply -n gdi-production -f- oc rollout latest -n gdi-production api-gateway oc rollout status -n gdi-production dc api-gateway
